sqlMap.sql: select u.PRMT_COST_REIT_ID, u.PRMT_COST_REIT_NO, u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.ZONE_ID, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, u.REQ_ID, u.REQ_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_DATE, u.EXCT_SMRZ, u.TOTAL_PRMT_COST, u.REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, u.COST_TYPE, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, b.AREA_NAME from ERP_PRMT_COST_REIT u left join ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ b on u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = b.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID
sqlMap.select: select count(0) cnt from ERP_PRMT_COST_REIT u
sqlMap.insert: insert into ERP_PRMT_COST_REIT( PRMT_COST_REIT_ID, CHANN_ID, CHANN_NO, CHANN_NAME, CHANN_PERSON_CON, CHANN_TEL, EXCT_SMRZ, COST_TYPE, REQ_ID, REQ_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_ID, AREA_MANAGE_NAME, AREA_MANAGE_TEL, PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, PRMT_COST_REIT_NO, REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, TOTAL_PRMT_COST, ZONE_ID, ZONE_ADDR, REQ_DATE, CRE_NAME, CREATOR, CRE_TIME, UPD_NAME, UPDATOR, UPD_TIME, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, ORG_ID, ORG_NAME, LEDGER_ID, LEDGER_NAME, STATE, DEL_FLAG )values( #PRMT_COST_REIT_ID#, #CHANN_ID#, #CHANN_NO#, #CHANN_NAME#, #CHANN_PERSON_CON#, #CHANN_TEL#, #EXCT_SMRZ#, #COST_TYPE#, #REQ_ID#, #REQ_NAME#, #AREA_MANAGE_ID#, #AREA_MANAGE_NAME#, #AREA_MANAGE_TEL#, #PRMT_COST_REQ_ID#, #PRMT_COST_REQ_NO#, #PRMT_COST_REIT_NO#, #REIT_REQ_AMOUNT#, #TOTAL_PRMT_COST#, #ZONE_ID#, #ZONE_ADDR#, to_date(#REQ_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD'), #CRE_NAME#, #CREATOR#, sysdate, #UPD_NAME#, #UPDATOR#, sysdate, #DEPT_ID#, #DEPT_NAME#, #ORG_ID#, #ORG_NAME#, #LEDGER_ID#, #LEDGER_NAME#, #STATE#, #DEL_FLAG# )
sqlMap.update:
update ERP_PRMT_COST_REIT
CHANN_ID = #CHANN_ID# CHANN_NO = #CHANN_NO# CHANN_NAME = #CHANN_NAME# CHANN_PERSON_CON = #CHANN_PERSON_CON# CHANN_TEL = #CHANN_TEL# EXCT_SMRZ = #EXCT_SMRZ# COST_TYPE = #COST_TYPE# REQ_NAME = #REQ_NAME# AREA_MANAGE_ID = #AREA_MANAGE_ID# AREA_MANAGE_NAME = #AREA_MANAGE_NAME# AREA_MANAGE_TEL = #AREA_MANAGE_TEL# PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = #PRMT_COST_REQ_ID# PRMT_COST_REQ_NO = #PRMT_COST_REQ_NO# PRMT_COST_REIT_NO = #PRMT_COST_REIT_NO# REIT_REQ_AMOUNT = #REIT_REQ_AMOUNT# TOTAL_PRMT_COST = #TOTAL_PRMT_COST# ZONE_ID = #ZONE_ID# ZONE_ADDR = #ZONE_ADDR# REQ_DATE =to_date(#REQ_DATE#,'yyyy-MM-DD') UPD_NAME = #UPD_NAME# UPDATOR = #UPDATOR# UPD_TIME = sysdate STATE = #STATE#
where PRMT_COST_REIT_ID = #PRMT_COST_REIT_ID#
sqlMap.delete: update ERP_PRMT_COST_REIT set DEL_FLAG = #DEL_FLAG# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where PRMT_COST_REIT_ID = #PRMT_COST_REIT_ID:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select: select u.PRMT_COST_REIT_ID, u.PRMT_COST_REIT_NO, u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID, u.PRMT_COST_REQ_NO, u.CHANN_ID, u.CHANN_NO, u.CHANN_NAME, u.CHANN_PERSON_CON, u.CHANN_TEL, u.ZONE_ID, u.ZONE_ADDR, u.AREA_MANAGE_ID, u.AREA_MANAGE_NAME, u.AREA_MANAGE_TEL, u.REQ_ID, u.REQ_NAME, to_char(u.REQ_DATE,'yyyy-MM-DD') REQ_DATE, u.EXCT_SMRZ, u.TOTAL_PRMT_COST, u.REIT_REQ_AMOUNT, u.COST_TYPE, u.AUDIT_ID, u.AUDIT_NAME, to_char(u.AUDIT_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AUDIT_TIME, u.CRE_NAME, u.CREATOR, to_char(u.CRE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRE_TIME, u.UPD_NAME, u.UPDATOR, to_char(u.UPD_TIME,'yyyy-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') UPD_TIME, u.DEPT_ID, u.DEPT_NAME, u.ORG_ID, u.ORG_NAME, u.LEDGER_ID, u.LEDGER_NAME, u.STATE, u.DEL_FLAG, b.AREA_NO, b.AREA_NAME from ERP_PRMT_COST_REIT u left join ERP_PRMT_COST_REQ b on u.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID = b.PRMT_COST_REQ_ID where u.PRMT_COST_REIT_ID = #PRMT_COST_REIT_ID#
sqlMap.update: update ERP_PRMT_COST_REIT set STATE = #STATE# ,UPD_NAME=#UPD_NAME# ,UPDATOR=#UPDATOR# ,UPD_TIME=sysdate where PRMT_COST_REIT_ID = #PRMT_COST_REIT_ID:VARCHAR#
